Olly Wiggins

student • business

I’m a university student studying Music Business. I’ve been involved in the industry for a number of years - starting out with production and performance - and later moving into marketing and management. You can see a selection of my latest work below.


  • BRUCH

    ‣ Artist Manager / December 2018 - Current Active

    BRUCH is an electronic music producer based in ACM Guildford.

  • Metropolis Blue

    ‣ Videography & Marketing / September 2018 - Current Active

    Metropolis Blue is a joint venture by Metropolis Studios and ACM. The label is run by - and dedicated to - students of the university.
